data.eml:eml: Revalidation and redescription of Feltia deprivata (Walker) (= bilitura of authors) (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae), a pest species on South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Agraín, Federico (2017): Revalidation and redescription of Feltia deprivata (Walker) (= bilitura of authors) (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae), a pest species on South America. Zootaxa 4323 (2): 250-260, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4323.2.8
